SEARCH
Module PacMan
Package scripts

Class Game

java.lang.Object
scripts.Game
public class Game extends Object
The Game class contains the core game logic for JPacMan, managing the GUI, characters, events, and game state, using a simple clock that runs 3 times for second
Since:
1.0.0
Version:
1.2.0
Author:
Davide Di Stefano

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private String[][]
    gameBoard
    The 2D matrix representing the current state of the game board.
    private Timer
    gameClock
    The main game timer responsible for updating the game state every 300 ms.
    private GameEvents
    gameEvents
    Manages all game-related events such as collisions, teleportation, ghost spawning, and victory/defeat conditions.
    private Ghost[]
    ghosts
    The array containing all active ghosts in the game.
    private static int
    ghostSpawnerCooldown
    Cooldown timer controlling how frequently new ghosts can be spawned.
    private static int
    invincibleModeCooldown
    Remaining frames during which PacMan is invincible.
    private static int
    lives
    The number of lives the player currently has.
    private PacMan
    pacman
    The PacMan player character controlled by the user.
    private static int
    score
    The player's current score.
    private HashMap<String,ImageIcon>
    spriteMap
    A map containing all loaded sprite images, indexed by their string identifiers.
    private GUI
    userGui
    The graphical user interface responsible for rendering the game board, score, lives, and all visual elements.
    private UserInput
    userInput
    Handles keyboard input from the user and updates PacMan's direction accordingly.

  • Field Details

    • pacman

      private PacMan pacman
      The PacMan player character controlled by the user.

    • ghosts

      private Ghost[] ghosts
      The array containing all active ghosts in the game. A null entry indicates that the ghost has not yet been spawned.

    • userGui

      private GUI userGui
      The graphical user interface responsible for rendering the game board, score, lives, and all visual elements.

    • userInput

      private UserInput userInput
      Handles keyboard input from the user and updates PacMan's direction accordingly.

    • gameEvents

      private GameEvents gameEvents
      Manages all game-related events such as collisions, teleportation, ghost spawning, and victory/defeat conditions.

    • gameBoard

      private String[][] gameBoard
      The 2D matrix representing the current state of the game board. Each cell contains a string identifying the tile or entity present.

    • spriteMap

      private HashMap<String,ImageIcon> spriteMap
      A map containing all loaded sprite images, indexed by their string identifiers.

    • score

      private static int score
      The player's current score.

    • invincibleModeCooldown

      private static int invincibleModeCooldown
      Remaining frames during which PacMan is invincible. When greater than zero, collisions with ghosts do not cause death.

    • lives

      private static int lives
      The number of lives the player currently has.

    • ghostSpawnerCooldown

      private static int ghostSpawnerCooldown
      Cooldown timer controlling how frequently new ghosts can be spawned. When it reaches zero, a ghost may be added to the game.

    • gameClock

      private Timer gameClock
      The main game timer responsible for updating the game state every 300 ms.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game()
      Initialises the game, setting up the game board, characters, GUI, and event clock.

  • Method Details

    • foodsScoreIncrease

      public static void foodsScoreIncrease()
      Increases the score by 2 for consuming food.

    • killedGhostScoreIncrease

      public static void killedGhostScoreIncrease()
      Increases the score by 200 for defeating a ghost.

    • spawnExtraLifeCherry

      public void spawnExtraLifeCherry()
      Spawns a special "extra life" item on the game board.

    • resetGameBoard

      public void resetGameBoard()
      Resets the game board to its initial state.

    • ghostSpawnerCooldownReset

      public static void ghostSpawnerCooldownReset()
      Resets the ghost spawn cooldown variable to its default value.

    • increaseInvincibilityTime

      public static void increaseInvincibilityTime()
      Increases invincibility time by 30 frames (10 seconds).

    • decreaseLife

      public static void decreaseLife()
      Decreases the player's lives by one.

    • increaseLifes

      public static void increaseLifes()
      Increases the player's lives by one.

    • getLives

      public static int getLives()
      Retrieves the current number of lives.
      Returns:
      The player's remaining lives.

    • getScore

      public static int getScore()
      Retrieves the current score.
      Returns:
      The player's score.

    • getInvincibility

      public static int getInvincibility()
      Retrieves the remaining invincibility cooldown.
      Returns:
      The remaining invincibility frames.
